primary_analysis.reasoning: After a strong intraday rally and a sharp rejection (large red candle), price has recovered into a tight consolidation just below recent highs. The short-term structure (last 20–30 candles) shows sideways action without a clean reversal or continuation candle pattern. Nearest tight actionable area is the recent cluster of upper wicks (~4145–4148). Wait for a clear breakout above this resistance (breakout pattern) or a clean bearish rejection there (bearish pattern) with stronger momentum before entering.

entry_analysis.reasoning: Recent short upper-wick rejection (bearish pin bar) formed in the vicinity of the 15-min zone (4145-4148). The tight 25-pip entry band is placed on the core overlap with the 15-min zone for a scalping entry; pattern is recent (within last 5-10 candles) so immediate entry is acceptable with moderate confidence.
